scripts.dev: husky install && cross-env NODE_TYPE=development next dev -p 15002
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_TYPE=development next build && rm -rf ./standalone && mv ./.next/standalone ./ && rm -rf ./standalone/public && cp -r ./public ./standalone/ && rm -rf standalone/.next && mv ./.next ./standalone/ && node next-script.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_TYPE=production  next build && rm -rf ./standalone && mv ./.next/standalone ./ && rm -rf ./standalone/public && cp -r ./public ./standalone/ && rm -rf standalone/.next && mv ./.next ./standalone/ && node next-script.js
scripts.build:cp: next build && rm -rf ./standalone && mv ./.next/standalone ./ && rm -rf ./standalone/public && cp -r ./public ./standalone/ && rm -rf standalone/.next && mv ./.next ./standalone/ && node next-script.js
scripts.build:tar: next build && rm -rf ./standalone && mv ./.next/standalone ./ && rm -rf ./standalone/public && cp -r ./public ./standalone/ && rm -rf standalone/.next && mv ./.next ./standalone/ && node next-script.js && tar -czvf standalone.tar.gz standalone
